so_26455543: find $target -type f -iname "*.txt" \
 | shuf \
 | awk -F- '{printf("%s:%s\n", $0, $NF)}' \
 | sort -t : -k 2 -s \
 | cut -d : -f 1 \
 | awk -F / '{printf("file '\''%s'\''\n", $0)}' \
 > $destination/results.txt

so_52871233: response="$(cat data.json)"
declare -a array
array=($(python -c "import json,sys; data=[arr['name'] for arr in json.loads(sys.argv[1])]; print('\n'.join(data));" "$response"))

echo "${array[@]}"

so_28971771: cat <<EOF | json_reformat | \
    sed -rne '/:/s@^\s+"(\w+)":\s+"([^"]+)",?@json_\1="\2"@gp'

EOF
